# linearMotionAlongZ

**Instance Property**

The linear motion limits along the z-axis.

## Declaration

```swift
var linearMotionAlongZ: PhysicsCustomJoint.MotionLimit
```

## Discussion

This property sets the limits of `pin1` along the z-axis of `pin0`.
title: linearMotionAlongZ
